data.actual_result: The button becomes greyed out and unclickable
data.expected_result: The buttons should be clickable again and you can try to connect your account again
data.short_description: When denying to connect your accounts in the partner application, they are greyed out regardless
data.steps_to_repro: - go to the partner application page - fill in your info until you should connect some accounts - click on either of the buttons but deny the authorization/close the window - observe
